Drink-driving Dunedin woman jailed after killing 29 lambs https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dunedin-woman-heavily-intoxated-jailed-after-killing-29-lambs/S5LN2BMK3RAN7CAQDHQQUXHIQA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dunedin-woman-heavily-intoxated-jailed-after-killing-29-lambs/S5LN2BMK3RAN7CAQDHQQUXHIQA/ Erin CoxShe was abusive to attending police and to shepherds on the scene attempting to help her. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 20:54:59 +0000 Annabelle Wyant, 43, attempted to kill a gang member in 2015 when she shot him in the chest. Her drinking habit has landed her in jail again after she rammed into a flock of lambs last year, killing 29 of them. Photo / Staff photographer
